chapter.title: Introduction to JBoss XACML
chapter.para: The JBoss XACML provides standards based, robust Policy Infrastruture library .
JBossXACML is based on Oasis XACML v2.0. It defines an API to read one or more PolicySets (and/or Policy files) via a simple configuration file.
At its core, JBossXACML makes use of the standards compliant, BSD style licensed SunXACML library available at http://sunxacml.sourceforge.net/
